name: AdShouts
overview:
AdShouts lets you directly propose exclusive and personal local deals to merchants and retailers.

How it works: When you need a local deal, you simply submit a proposal describing whatever you are looking for. Thatâ€™s it.

AdShouts will help you find the best local deals that match your current needs. The days of typing keywords, clicking ads, and dialing businesses for all your consumer search needs are over. You no longer have to deal with daily emails, offers, and coupons that are irrelevant and don’t target your immediate needs, interests, or characteristics.

AdShouts uses proprietary algorithms, social media, and automated VoIP technology to help you target and promote your local deal proposals with matching merchants and retailers. We match and relay exclusive offers right to your inbox for your review and consideration.
